sentences.en: A wrinkled purse, a wrinkled face.
sentences.cn: 手中无钱, 愁容满面.

sentences.en: I locked the door and dropped the keys in my purse.
sentences.cn: 我锁上门，然后把钥匙丢进手提包里。

sentences.en: I ransacked the house looking for my purse.
sentences.cn: 我满房子各处找我的钱包.

sentences.en: I took a coin out of my purse and gave it to the child.
sentences.cn: 我从钱包取出一枚硬币给那个小孩。

sentences.en: Julie opened her handbag and took out her purse.
sentences.cn: 朱莉打开手袋，拿出钱包。

sentences.en: Mrs Biddell pursed her lips and shook her head.
sentences.cn: 比德尔太太噘起嘴，摇了摇头。

sentences.en: She cried out that she had lost her purse.
She folded it up, and tucked it into her purse.
sentences.cn: 她将其折叠起来，塞进了钱包里。

sentences.en: She got snagged by the police while stealing the purse.
sentences.cn: 她在偷钱包时被警察一把抓住了.

sentences.en: She looked at me and then reached in her purse for cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 她看看我，接着伸手去包里拿香烟。

sentences.en: Someone has stolen her purse when she was shopping.
sentences.cn: 她在购物时,有人偷走了她的钱包.

sentences.en: Sue never carried anything other than the teeniest purse.
sentences.cn: 休从来都只带着一只小钱包。

sentences.en: The bank has been too slow in loosening the purse strings.
sentences.cn: 银行一直迟迟不愿放开资金。

sentences.en: The purse has been picked and stolen from my pocket.
sentences.cn: 我的钱包被人从口袋里摸走了.

sentences.en: They collected a purse to help the flood victims.
sentences.cn: 他们收集了一笔钱以帮助洪灾难民.

sentences.en: Where under the sun could I have put the purse?
sentences.cn: 我究竟把钱包放在哪儿了?

sentences.en: Who holds the purse strings in your house?
Women control the purse-strings of most families.
sentences.cn: 大多数家庭由女性掌握财政大权。

phrases.tran_cn: 装硬币的钱包；钱包；零钱袋
掌握开支；掌管财权，掌管钱财
n. 围网；捕鱼用的袋网
管钱；控制财权；钱袋口上的绳子

trans.tran_cn: 钱包，钱袋，财力，财源，和包或钱袋相似的东西，女用小提包
trans.tran_en: a small bag in which women keep paper money, coins, cards etc
if you purse your lips, you bring them together tightly into a small circle, especially to show disapproval or doubt
